nodes.text: "Bounty Hunter's Pursuit" is a theatrical motif written by John Williams for the score for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and its respective soundtrack. It was written in 2002. The theme is used to represent Jango Fett and Obi-Wan Kenobi fighting in the rings of Geonosis, and, later in the piece, Obi-wan's first viewing of the clone army.
